column4: 2019 at 2.32 pm an accident happened along Road 4 between 62-63 kilometers
column7: a Korean living in Chom Chao 2
column8: was driving from west to east on his PCX when he fell off. No other vehicles are reported to have been involved.------After the incident
column9: the victim was sent to Kompong Speu Provincial Hospital while motorbike was kept at the police station.------Source: General Department of Immigration
